steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'References' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Footnotes' group, click on the 'Show Notes' dropdown button.
All the endnotes in the document will be displayed at the end of the document.
Click on the first endnote reference in the document.
Press 'Ctrl+Shift+F5' on your keyboard to convert the endnote to a footnote.
Repeat steps 6 and 7 for each endnote in the document.
Save the document to apply the changes.
